body_html:
@poxvoculi What we saw matches your description. Hang happens when 4+ GPUs are used. It goes away when we increase the number of threads. @yanivbl6 is working on a fix.

@junshi15 Cool thanks, I hit a very similar problem and got stuck during the warm up. As you suggested, I increased inter_op_parallelism_threads to work around the problem.

before changing the number of threads, I couldn't get this far.
2018-10-20 01:54:02.736996: I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:151] successfully opened CUDA library libcupti.so.9.2 locally
body:
> @poxvoculi What we saw matches your description. Hang happens when 4+ GPUs are used. It goes away when we increase the number of threads. @yanivbl6 is working on a [fix](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/12361).

@junshi15  Cool thanks, I hit a very similar problem and got stuck during the warm up. As you suggested, I increased `inter_op_parallelism_threads` to work around the problem. 

before changing the number of threads, I couldn't get this far. 
`2018-10-20 01:54:02.736996: I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:151] successfully opened CUDA library libcupti.so.9.2 locally`
